metadata.dc:author: Fabregat, J R
metadata.dc:description: Here are described the topics that we think are essentials in the anti-arrhythmia drug selection. Those factors are the subtract, the threshold and the modulator factors. Are also included the place were anti-arrhythmia agents acts, their general actions, their failure and finally the basis of the combined therapy.
metadata.dc:title: Selección y combinación de antiarrítmicos.
[Selection and combination of anti-arrhythmic agents].
metadata.dc:publisher: Archivos del Instituto de Cardiologia de Mexico
